name: Default Fallback intent
Welcome message
speechResponse: Hi {{context["username"] }} ### What can i do for you ?

name: CreateInvoice

trainingData.text: How do I create a new electronic invoice?
How can I generate a new invoice?
Steps to create an electronic invoice?

speechResponse: To create a new electronic invoice, go to the "Invoices" section and click on the "Create New Invoice" button. Fill in the required details, such as customer information, items sold, and payment terms. Once done, click "Save" to generate the new invoice.

name: SendInvoices

trainingData.text: Can I send invoices to multiple customers at once?
Is there a way to send multiple invoices together?
How to send invoices to multiple customers?

speechResponse: Yes, you can send invoices to multiple customers simultaneously. In the "Invoices" section, select the invoices you want to send, then click on the "Send" button. Choose the delivery method, either via email or web, and the invoices will be sent to the respective customers.

name: PaymentStatus

trainingData.text: How can I track the payment status of my invoices?
Where to find invoice payment status?
Tell me about invoice payment updates.

speechResponse: To track the payment status of your invoices, navigate to the "Payments" tab. Here, you will see a list of all your invoices and their corresponding payment status, whether paid, pending, or overdue.

name: CustomizeInvoice

trainingData.text: Is it possible to customize the invoice template?
Can I personalize the invoice layout?

speechResponse: Yes, you can customize the invoice template to match your brand. Go to the "Settings" section, then choose "Invoice Templates." From there, you can edit the layout, add your company logo, and modify the color scheme to suit your preferences.

name: ImportCustomers

trainingData.text: How do I import my existing customer list into MiInvoice?

speechResponse: To import your existing customer list, go to the "Customers" section and click on the "Import Customers" button. Follow the instructions to upload a CSV file containing your customer data. MiInvoice will then automatically add these customers to your list.

name: RecurringInvoices

trainingData.text: Can I set up recurring invoices for regular clients?

speechResponse: Yes, you can set up recurring invoices for regular clients. When creating a new invoice, select the "Recurring" option and choose the frequency (e.g., weekly, monthly). MiInvoice will automatically generate and send the invoice at the specified intervals.

name: Security

trainingData.text: How secure is MiInvoice for handling sensitive financial information?

speechResponse: MiInvoice takes data security seriously. We use industry-standard encryption and follow best practices to safeguard your sensitive financial information. Rest assured that your data is protected and only accessible to authorized users.

name: ExportInvoiceData

trainingData.text: Can I export my invoice data for accounting purposes?
How to get invoice data in a file?

speechResponse: Absolutely! In the "Reports" section, you can generate and export various reports, including invoice summaries, payment history, and tax reports, in CSV or PDF format for easy integration with your accounting system.

name: MobileApp

trainingData.text: Is there a mobile app for MiInvoice?

speechResponse: Yes, we have a mobile app available for both Android and iOS devices. You can download it from the respective app stores and access MiInvoice on the go.

name: ContactSupport

trainingData.text: How do I contact customer support if I encounter any issues?
Facing a problem, what to do?

speechResponse: If you encounter any issues or have questions, you can reach out to our customer support team via the "Support" section. Submit your query, and our team will get back to you promptly to assist you further.
